flavorText: Deception and misdirection are the heart of the pirate's arsenal.

foreignData.flavorText: Täuschung und Blendung gehören zum wichtigsten Handwerkszeug echter Piraten.
foreignData.name: List der Sirene
foreignData.text: Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil und bringe ihre Karte dann unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück. Falls ein Pirat auf diese Weise ins Exil geschickt wurde, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: El engaño y la distracción son las principales armas de un pirata.
foreignData.name: Ardid de la sirena
foreignData.text: Exilia la criatura objetivo que controlas, luego regresa esa carta al campo de batalla bajo el control de su propietario. Si un Pirata fue exiliado de esta manera, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Tromperies et manigances sont au cœur de la panoplie du pirate.
foreignData.name: Ruse de la sirène
foreignData.text: Exilez une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez, puis renvoyez cette carte sur le champ de bataille sous le contrôle de son propriétaire. Si un pirate a été exilé de cette manière, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Inganno e distrazione sono le basi dell'arsenale di ogni pirata.
foreignData.name: Stratagemma dei Sirenidi
foreignData.text: Esilia una creatura bersaglio che controlli, poi rimetti quella carta sul campo di battaglia sotto il controllo del suo proprietario. Se un Pirata è stato esiliato in questo modo, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 欺瞞と誤導が海賊の主要な武器になる。
foreignData.name: セイレーンの策略
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。その後、そのカードをオーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。これにより海賊が追放されたなら、カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: 속임수와 거짓 길 안내는 해적들의 주요 무기다.
foreignData.name: 세이렌의 계략
foreignData.text: 당신이 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 추방한 후, 소유자의 조종하에 전장으로 되돌린다. 해적이 이런 식으로 추방되었다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: O engodo e o despistamento são as armas principais de um pirata.
foreignData.name: Ardil da Sirena
foreignData.text: Exile a criatura alvo que você controla e, depois, devolva aquele card ao campo de batalha sob o controle de seu dono. Se um Pirata foi exilado desta forma, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Обман и отвод глаз — основа арсенала каждого пирата.
foreignData.name: Уловка Ревуньи
foreignData.text: Изгоните целевое существо под вашим контролем, затем верните ту карту на поле битвы под контролем ее владельца. Если таким образом был изгнан Пират, возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 欺敌与误导是海盗的核心武器。
foreignData.name: 塞连诈术
foreignData.text: 放逐目标由你操控的生物，然后将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。如果以此法放逐的是海盗，则抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 欺敵與誤導是海盜的核心武器。
foreignData.name: 塞連詐術
foreignData.text: 放逐目標由你操控的生物，然後將該牌在其擁有者的操控下移回戰場。如果以此法放逐的是海盜，則抽一張牌。

name: Siren's Ruse
originalText: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If a Pirate was exiled this way, draw a card.

rulings.text: Once the exiled creature returns, it’s considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creature will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist.
The returned creature won’t be the target of any spells or abilities that targeted it before. Any spells that don’t target it, such as Star of Extinction, will still affect it.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.

You’ll draw a card if the creature was a Pirate as it was exiled, even if it doesn’t return to the battlefield (most likely because it’s a token) or if it returns to the battlefield but isn’t a Pirate anymore (most likely because it’s copying something else).

text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If a Pirate was exiled this way, draw a card.
